"Gunslash":
"Gunslashes are ranged weapons which excel in close combat, notable for their high mobility.

Their PAs all change behaviour when you input a direction while using them."

"The Class Skill \"Slash Pursuit\" lets you perform a follow-up attack by pressing the Normal Attack button at the correct time after using a PA.

It's a powerful attack that also recovers PP, so try to use it as often as you can."

"The PA \"Shifting Spica\" lets you slash in front of you, then fire off a close-range Photon Bullet.

If you're inputting a direction when you use it, you'll close in on the enemy at high speed before striking."
